Asụsụ Bantu nke North East Coast bụ asụsụ Bantu nke a na-asụ n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke ndi obodo Tanzania na Kenya, gụnyere n'ime ime obodo nke Tanzania rioja na Dodoma. Na nhazi ala Guthrie, ha dabara n'ime mpaghara Bantu G na E.
Asụsụ, ma ọ bụ ụyọkọ, bụ:
Asụsụ Ruvu bụ 6070% yiri ya n'okwu.
Mbugu (Ma'a) is a mixed language based largely on Pare.
